games.summary: Karl-Anthony Towns scored 39 points and Landry Shamet added a career-high 36 points off the bench as the New York Knicks beat the Miami Heat 140-130 in an NBA Cup game on Friday night. Jordan Clarkson scored 25 points, Mikal Bridges had 15, and Josh Hart recorded his first triple-double of the season with 12 points, 12 rebounds and 10 assists as the Knicks posted a season-high point total.
blurbs: 📋 Miles McBride (NY) made just his 2nd start this season. 9 pts, 4 reb.
⬆️ Jordan Clarkson (NY) played 33 min (season avg: 16). 24 pts, 5 reb, 3 ast.
⬆️ Landry Shamet (NY) played 37 min (season avg: 19). 36 pts, 2 reb, 3 ast.
⬆️ Kel'el Ware (MIA) played 35 min (season avg: 23). 15 pts, 10 reb, 1 ast.

games.summary: ORLANDO, Fla. -- — Franz Wagner scored 25 points, Tristan da Silva added 22 points and nine rebounds and the Orlando Magic held Brooklyn scoreless over the final two-and-a-half minutes for a 105-98 victory over the Nets on Friday night.
blurbs: 🆕 Tristan da Silva (ORL) made his first start of the season. 32 min, 22 pts.
📋 Egor Demin (BKN) made just his 4th start this season. 8 pts, 3 reb.

games.summary: Javonte Green scored 21 points and Daniss Jenkins added 19 as the short-handed Detroit Pistons won their ninth straight game, beating the Philadelphia 76ers 114-105 in an NBA Cup game on Friday night. Maxey scored six points in the fourth, but none of his teammates could get going and the Pistons took a 114-103 lead on LeVert's dunk with 1:44 to play.
blurbs: 📋 Paul Reed (DET) made just his 2nd start this season. 10 pts, 8 reb.
📋 Ronald Holland II (DET) made just his 4th start this season. 9 pts, 5 reb.
📋 Javonte Green (DET) made just his 3rd start this season. 21 pts, 9 reb.
📋 Daniss Jenkins (DET) made just his 2nd start this season. 19 pts, 3 reb.
📋 Trendon Watford (PHI) made just his 4th start this season. 5 pts, 1 reb.
📋 Andre Drummond (PHI) made just his 3rd start this season. 12 pts, 11 reb.

games.summary: Kevin Durant scored 30 points, Alperen Sengun added 25 points, 10 rebounds and nine assists and the Houston Rockets won their third straight with a 140-116 win over the Portland Trail Blazers in an NBA Cup game on Friday night. scored 22 points, Amen Thompson had 19 points and Reed Sheppard 13.

Giannis Antetokounmpo had 25 points, 18 assists and seven rebounds in his return and the Bucks outlasted former Milwaukee high school star Kon Knueppel and the Charlotte Hornets 147-134 in overtime Friday night in an NBA Cup game. Knueppel scored a season-high 32 points in his first NBA game in his hometown.
blurbs: 📋 Kyle Kuzma (MIL) made just his 3rd start this season. 29 pts, 10 reb.
🆕 Moussa Diabate (CHA) made his first start of the season. 43 min, 15 pts.
⬆️ Sion James (CHA) played 42 min (season avg: 26). 12 pts, 7 reb, 3 ast.

games.summary: Anthony Edwards scored 30 points and Julius Randle added 26 points and 11 rebounds as the Minnesota Timberwolves pulled away in the fourth quarter and beat the Sacramento Kings 124-110 in an NBA Cup game Friday night. Zach Lavine scored 25 points, while Russell Westbrook extended his NBA record with his 205th career triple-double, posting 13 points, 14 assists and 10 rebounds.
blurbs: 📋 Precious Achiuwa (SAC) made just his 4th start this season. 4 pts, 3 reb.

games.summary: Austin Reaves scored 31, Luka Doncic had 24 points and 12 assists, and the Los Angeles Lakers cruised to a 118-104 victory over the New Orleans Pelicans in an NBA Cup game on Friday night. Rui Hachimura scored 14 and Marcus Smart 13 for the Lakers, who led 65-52 at halftime after Doncic fed Ayton for an alley-oop dunk.

James Harden scored four of his 10 overtime points in the second extra period and finished with season highs of 41 points and 14 rebounds, along with 11 assists, as the Los Angeles Clippers beat the Dallas Mavericks 133-127 in an NBA Cup game on Friday night.
blurbs: 🆕 Naji Marshall (DAL) made his first start of the season. 47 min, 28 pts.
📋 Brandon Williams (DAL) made just his 3rd start this season. 7 pts, 2 reb.
⬆️ D'Angelo Russell (DAL) played 39 min (season avg: 20). 28 pts, 6 reb, 5 ast.
📋 John Collins (LAC) made just his 3rd start this season. 8 pts, 3 reb.
⬆️ Derrick Jones Jr. (LAC) played 40 min (season avg: 25). 15 pts, 4 reb, 0 ast.
⬆️ Ivica Zubac (LAC) played 46 min (season avg: 30). 27 pts, 11 reb, 2 ast.

games.summary: Stephen Curry had 49 points, outdueling Victor Wembanyama in another intense battle and the Golden State Warriors rallied to beat the San Antonio Spurs 109-108 on Friday night for their first win in the NBA Cup. Wembanyama had 26 points, 12 rebounds, four assists and three blocks in 38 minutes but San Antonio fell to 1-1 in the NBA Cup.
blurbs: 📋 Moses Moody (GS) made just his 4th start this season. 4 pts, 3 reb.
📋 Will Richard (GS) made just his 3rd start this season. 10 pts, 1 reb.
